characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per battle, at the start of your Movement phase, Astorath may chant the Mass of Doom. Roll a D6 for each friendly BLOOD ANGELS INFANTRY unit within 6" of Astorath and apply the result below:  1 - Frenzied Death Throes: The unit suffers a mortal wound. 2-5 - Dark Wrath: You can add 1 to hit rolls made for this unit in the Fight phase until the end of your turn. 6 - Vessel of Sanguinius: You can add 1 to hit rolls made for this unit in the Fight phase until the end of your turn. In addition, the unit has a 4+ invulnerable save until the end of your turn.
